title: Tech Query: Central Bank Of India, NHPC, Motherson Sumi Wiring India, Aarti Industries. What Is The Outlook? Where Are These Stocks Headed?
description:
I have shares of Central Bank of India. My purchase price is ₹65. What is the outlook?

Isha, Mumbai

Central Bank of India (₹38.40): The trend is down. There is room on the downside for a fall to ₹29. After this fall, there is a good chance to see a rise towards ₹55-57 or ₹60. Eventually, the stock...

title: Tax cuts dent revenue growth, less scope for fiscal policy support to economy: Moody's
description:
Moody's Ratings on Tuesday said tax cuts in the current fiscal has dented India's revenue growth, leaving less scope for fiscal policy support for the economy.

title: RBI rate cut coming? Experts split as inflation hits rock bottom
description: Mumbai: The Reserve Bank of India may reduce the benchmark lending rate by 25 basis points in its upcoming monetary policy meeting, as inflationary pressures remain low. description:

title: India Q2 GDP Highlights: Economic growth jumps to six-quarter high of 8.2% — analysts peg FY26 fig at 7%-plus
description:
India Q2 GDP Highlights: India's GDP grew 8.2% year-on-year in July-September, beating expectations, driven by strong consumer spending and manufacturing, even as global trade uncertainties lingered.

description: The Union Government recently notified four new comprehensive Labour Codes, consolidating 29 existing labour laws.
